snippet.title: Duskers Review - Worthabuy?
snippet.description:
Pilot drones into derelict spaceships to find the means to survive and piece together how the universe became a giant graveyard.

Greenman Gaming Link - Use this link to purchase your games.
http://www.greenmangaming.com/?tap_a=1964-996bbb&tap_s=6586-4b38de

During the checking out use the code MACK20-MACK20-MACK20 and you could get 20% off your purchase :)
